roleset.name: communicate, discussing, passing information
roleset.note: COMMUNICATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'communicate' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries battle-36.4-1, correspond-36.1, transfer_mesg-37.1.1. Framenet entry Communication. (from communicate.01-v predicate notes)

COMMUNICATION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry communicate.01, OntoNotes grouping communication-n sense 1; maps to VN classes battle-36.4-1, correspond-36.1, transfer_mesg-37.1.1. Framed by Claire. (from communication.01-n)

role.descr: other communicator(s), communicated with or to

example.name: all args
example.text: Mr. Guber says that Mr. Semel did convey that information and that Mr. Semel said Mr. Ross was ``crazy because of the Time deal,'' meaning, Mr. Guber says, that [Mr. Ross]-1 ``did not want *trace*-1 to communicate to his new merger partner, Time Inc., that Warner's agreements provided for our departure under these circumstances.''
example.arg: his new merger partner, Time Inc.,
that Warner's agreements provided for our departure under these circumstances

example.name: unstated communication
example.text: We-1 lost our chance *trace*-1 to communicate with sweet-natured visitors ``about four feet tall (who) looked as though they were made of puffed-up marshmallow.''
example.arg: with sweet-natured visitors ``about four feet tall (who) looked as though they were made of puffed-up marshmallow

example.name: no co-communicator
example.text: John-1 is not very good at *trace*-1 communicating his wishes.

example.name: Arg 1
example.text: The communication of the details of the plan took two hours.
example.arg: of the details of the plan

example.name: NP only, Arg2
example.text: concomitantly opening up channels of communications with theTigrean rebels through neighboring Sudan

example.name: Communicators as one constituent, MNR
example.text: Communication between the prisoners via tapping sounds began on Friday.

example.name: Arg0 as "from" PP, MNR
example.text: They could not act without official communication from Moscow.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: If a physicist, in her own thought and her communication with other physicists about physics, were obliged to use nothing but layman's terms, little could be said.
